013package org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.bean.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ClassUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.httppart.HttpPartType.*;
020
021import java.util.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.httppart.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.reflect.*;
028
029/**
030 * Represents the metadata gathered from a parameter or class annotated with {@link Request}.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
033 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jm.HttpPartSerializersParsers">HTTP Part Serializers and Parsers</a>
034 * </ul>
035 */
036public class RequestBeanMeta {
037
038   /**
039    * Create metadata from specified parameter.
040    *
041    * @param mpi The method parameter.
042    * @param annotations The annotations to apply to any new part serializers or parsers.
043    * @return Metadata about the parameter, or <jk>null</jk> if parameter or parameter type not annotated with {@link Request}.
044    */
045   public static RequestBeanMeta create(ParamInfo mpi, AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
046      if (mpi.hasNoAnnotation(Request.class))
047         return null;
048      return new RequestBeanMeta.Builder(annotations).apply(mpi).build();
049   }
050
051   /**
052    * Create metadata from specified class.
053    *
054    * @param c The class annotated with {@link Request}.
055    * @param annotations The annotations to apply to any new part serializers or parsers.
056    * @return Metadata about the class, or <jk>null</jk> if class not annotated with {@link Request}.
057    */
058   public static RequestBeanMeta create(Class<?> c, AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
059      ClassInfo ci = ClassInfo.of(c);
060      if (ci.hasNoAnnotation(Request.class))
061         return null;
062      return new RequestBeanMeta.Builder(annotations).apply(c).build();
063   }
064
065   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
066   // Instance
067   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
068
069   private final ClassMeta<?> cm;
070   private final Map<String,RequestBeanPropertyMeta> properties;
071   private final HttpPartSerializer serializer;
072   private final HttpPartParser parser;
073
074   RequestBeanMeta(Builder b) {
075      this.cm = b.cm;
076      this.serializer = b.serializer.orElse(null);
077      this.parser = b.parser.orElse(null);
078      Map<String,RequestBeanPropertyMeta> properties = map();
079      b.properties.forEach((k,v) -> properties.put(k, v.build(serializer, parser)));
080      this.properties = u(properties);
081   }
082
083   static class Builder {
084      ClassMeta<?> cm;
085      AnnotationWorkList annotations;
086      BeanCreator<HttpPartSerializer> serializer = BeanCreator.of(HttpPartSerializer.class);
087      BeanCreator<HttpPartParser> parser = BeanCreator.of(HttpPartParser.class);
088      Map<String,RequestBeanPropertyMeta.Builder> properties = map();
089
090      Builder(AnnotationWorkList annotations) {
091         this.annotations = annotations;
092      }
093
094      Builder apply(ParamInfo mpi) {
095         return apply(mpi.getParameterType().inner()).apply(mpi.getAnnotation(Request.class));
096      }
097
098      Builder apply(Class<?> c) {
099         this.cm = BeanContext.DEFAULT.getClassMeta(c);
100         apply(cm.getLastAnnotation(Request.class));
101         cm.getInfo().forEachPublicMethod(x -> true, x -> {
102            String n = x.getSimpleName();
103            if (x.hasAnnotation(Header.class)) {
104               assertNoArgs(x, Header.class);
105               assertReturnNotVoid(x, Header.class);
106               properties.put(n, RequestBeanPropertyMeta.create(HEADER, Header.class, x));
107            } else if (x.hasAnnotation(Query.class)) {
108               assertNoArgs(x, Query.class);
109               assertReturnNotVoid(x, Query.class);
110               properties.put(n, RequestBeanPropertyMeta.create(QUERY, Query.class, x));
111            } else if (x.hasAnnotation(FormData.class)) {
112               assertNoArgs(x, FormData.class);
113               assertReturnNotVoid(x, FormData.class);
114               properties.put(n, RequestBeanPropertyMeta.create(FORMDATA, FormData.class, x));
115            } else if (x.hasAnnotation(Path.class)) {
116               assertNoArgs(x, Path.class);
117               assertReturnNotVoid(x, Path.class);
118               properties.put(n, RequestBeanPropertyMeta.create(PATH, Path.class, x));
119            } else if (x.hasAnnotation(Content.class)) {
120               assertNoArgs(x, Content.class);
121               assertReturnNotVoid(x, Content.class);
122               properties.put(n, RequestBeanPropertyMeta.create(BODY, Content.class, x));
123            }
124         });
125         return this;
126      }
127
128      Builder apply(Request a) {
129         if (a != null) {
130            if (isNotVoid(a.serializer()))
131               serializer.type(a.serializer());
132            if (isNotVoid(a.parser()))
133               parser.type(a.parser());
134         }
135         return this;
136      }
137
138      RequestBeanMeta build() {
139         return new RequestBeanMeta(this);
140      }
141   }
142
143   /**
144    * Returns metadata about the class.
145    *
146    * @return Metadata about the class.
147    */
148   public ClassMeta<?> getClassMeta() {
149      return cm;
150   }
151
152   /**
153    * Returns metadata about the bean property with the specified property name.
154    *
155    * @param name The bean property name.
156    * @return Metadata about the bean property, or <jk>null</jk> if none found.
157    */
158   public RequestBeanPropertyMeta getProperty(String name) {
159      return properties.get(name);
160   }
161
162   /**
163    * Returns all the annotated methods on this bean.
164    *
165    * @return All the annotated methods on this bean.
166    */
167   public Collection<RequestBeanPropertyMeta> getProperties() {
168      return properties.values();
169   }
170}
